divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in my car on my way to culinary school and I noticed what I thought was going to be an airplane to my left, the direction of the airport and I frequently watch planes take off and come in for landing. But when I looked directly at the object, I saw it wasn't a plane, but a black triangle with bright white lights at each corner and it was no more than 500 feet above tree tops and was stationary. I kept looking at it for about a minute while driving and noticed a plane take off in the distance, which further showed me how stationary this object was. Every so often after that I would keep watching the object and check back to the road since I was driving, and after a total time of about two minutes of looking at this object it disappeared while I was doing a road check. The road check lasted only 3 - 4 seconds and the object had completely vanished from sight.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around January 9th 2007
Summary: Black triangle with a bright white light at each corner
